InfectedStat: Measures the number of infected individuals in the observed timestep.
DeadStat: Measures the number of deceased individuals in the observed timestep.
CriticalStat: Measures the number of critically ill individuals in the observed timestep.
RecoveredStat: Measures the number of recovered individuals in the observed timestep.
InfectionAboveThresholdReward: Indicates whether the infection level is above a certain threshold in the observed timestep.
Stage: Indicates the current stage of the pandemic response in the observed timestep.
